title: Sonoma
name: Envolve Winery
directions: Just of the Square in the Sonoma Court Shops
content: Organic winery with a modern style tasting room just off the Square. It's owned by three guys who have been friends since the were kids - one of them includes Ben, who the "star" of the Season 16 of the Bachelor. Don't let the silly factor turn you off - the wine is good and the people are friendly. Proceeds from their rose wine go to breast cancer research, too.
